title: Convenient and Keeping up the Premier inn standards
text: Decided to choose Premier inn after our amazing stay in Abu Dhabi which was unplanned and unexpected but very memorable for the service we recived .The receptionist Ritika there had informed us that Staff and premier inn all over the world can never go wrong with its service and as a traveller i second that now. They truely stand by it.The convenience of location made it a good choice for us. At the reception Ricardo was good and helpful. The rooms are nice clean beds ver comforable. We loved our stay. As frequent travellers we would suggest Premier inn to provide us with discount card that can be redeemed worldwide at all Premier inn like Hilton.
